diseases.name: breast cancer
diseases.description: Defects in BRCA2 are a cause of susceptibility to breast cancer (BC)

diseases.name: BROVCA2
diseases.description: Defects in BRCA2 are involved in familial breast-ovarian cancer type 2

diseases.name: FANCD1
diseases.description: Defects in BRCA2 are the cause of Fanconi anemia complementation group D type 1
